title: BRIEF-T. Rowe Price Group Preliminary Month-End Assets Under Management Of $991 Bln As Of Dec. 31

organizations.name: rowe price group preliminary month-end assets under managem
rowe price group preliminary month-end assets under management
reuters) - t. rowe price group inc

text:
43 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-T. Rowe Price Group Preliminary Month-End Assets Under Management Of $991 Bln As Of Dec. 31 Reuters Staff 
Jan 11 (Reuters) - T. Rowe Price Group Inc: 
* T. ROWE PRICE GROUP REPORTS PRELIMINARY MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT FOR DECEMBER 2017 
* T. ROWE PRICE GROUP INC - PRELIMINARY MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $991 BILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 
* T. ROWE PRICE GROUP - CLIENT TRANSFERS FROM MUTUAL FUNDS TO OTHER PORTFOLIOS WERE $1.7 BILLION FOR MONTH-ENDED DEC. 31 
* T. ROWE PRICE GROUP - CLIENT TRANSFERS FROM MUTUAL FUNDS TO OTHER PORTFOLIOS WERE $4.2 BILLION FOR QUARTER-ENDED DEC. 31 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
